title: Having issues connecting
body: So i get a disconnection error every 4 games or so, but i run youtube while i am in lobby/waiting for the game to start, why is it that it takes me 3 or 4 tries to even get the game started again? its ridiculous.

replies.body: Even the slightest hiccup in your internet connection will disrupt you loading into the game, so I'd suggest calling your isp and having them test your line to see if it's faulty or damaged, I know coz this used to happen to me before I got the nbn
ive had a new line pout in and recently check for faults for reasons other than league, and its was all fine.
im my experience when that does happen you cant reconnect until the game has already started
Have you tried a client repair?
